item.title: swift macos 应用开发基础之显示其他的window
item.description: 最近在开发flomo-mac，需要显示第二个window，记录下 @IBAction func showMiniWindow(_ sender: Any) { let storyboard = NSStoryboard(name: NSStoryboard.Name("Main"), bundle: nil) if let windowController = storyboard.instantiateController(withIdentifier: "miniWindow") as? MiniFlomoWindowController { windowController.showWindow(self) } } MiniFlomoWindowController 配置如下

item.title: swift macos 应用开发基础之网络请求
